item.title: Pro Coders
item.dc:creator: @Darthax Darthax
item.description:
@Darthax wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:4, topic:329915”]wow you didn’t even use updategameframe?
here do this:

                        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cut")) {
                                if(inCombat) {
                                        sM("You cannot use this command while in combat.");
                                        return;
                                }
                                playerLevel[3] -= 10;
			        sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[3]+"", 4016);
			        updateRequired = true;
			        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                refreshSkills();
                                plrText = "Awwwwwww yes!";
                                plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
                        }

try this? kinda pointless command though -.-[/quote]

you beat me this time next time i will have your ass [lmao]

item.title: Pro Coders
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Eh, 317, made a command called “cut”. Can’t find a method for “refreshSkill(3);” I need someones help with the command. -.-

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cut")) { if(inCombat) { sM("You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } playerLevel[3] -= 10; refreshSkills(); plrText = ("Awwwwwww yes!"); plrTextUpdateRequired = true; }

The message “Awwwwwww yes!” doesn’t work, and the "refreshSkills(); doesn’t work, and the -10 hp doesn’t update until I relog. I have no clue what i did wrong. -.-.

Help please. <3

Read full topic
